text.name: sys_description
text.text: The first MSX2+, produced by Panasonic and Sony, were released exclusively in Japan on October 21, 1988. It will bring a 256x212 pixel mode with 19,268 colors as well as horizontal hardware scrolling in addition to the vertical. A Yamaha MSX-Music cartridge offering an extension to 9 FM channels is also available.
